messages.subject: Research: Survey & Thesis
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, My name is Coleen Kosan and  I am a graduate student. I am working on completing my Masters of Education in Curriculum and Instruction. My husband and I
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

My name is Coleen Kosan and I am a graduate student. I am working on completing my Masters of Education in Curriculum and Instruction. My husband and I have been unschooling our two boys for 17 years. I am beginning my research for my thesis and the focus will be unschooling and Project-Based Learning (PBL) as a learning option( not required). I will be conducting an anonymous and confidential survey to gather the information. The answers are confidential and I do not see emails, names or any other sensitive information from the participants. If you choose to take the survey you give me consent to be a participant. If someone chooses not to participate then they simply delete this email :)
The url to take the survey is: http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/DYF8YJT
(cut and paste this link into your browser address area)
Happy Learning
Coleen Kosan
coleen.kosan@... (please email me if you have questions)
